trans-unit.source: Provides a class that encapsulates theme and style sheet information for controls in a designer environment.
Page developers and control authors do not use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class.

ASP.NET developer tool and designer builders use the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class in conjunction with the <xref:System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder> class and the <xref:System.Web.UI.IThemeResolutionService> interface to apply themes and their respective control skins to controls at design time.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class encapsulates the information needed to apply a theme or style sheet theme and its control skins to the child controls of a control in a designer.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> class.

The `themeDefinition` parameter passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> constructor represents the concatenation of all control skins associated with the theme but is not exposed directly by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider> class, as this particular parameter is passed to a <xref:System.Web.UI.DesignTimeTemplateParser> to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> and is not otherwise used.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that represents the current designer environment.
The name of the theme or style sheet theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> represents.
This parameter can be `null`.
Theme information passed to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DesignTimeTemplateParser.ParseTheme(System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost,System.String,System.String)"></xref> method.
These are the raw, concatenated contents of the theme.
The names of the cascading style sheet (CSS) files that are included with the theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> represents.
The absolute path of the file that contains the theme and control skin information for the named theme.
Gets the hash of the theme definition passed to the constructor.
A hash code for the string passed as the theme definition to the class constructor.
Gets a set of strings that represent the names of any cascading style sheet (CSS) files associated with the current theme, if the theme is a style sheet theme.
This property is used by designer hosts to add style sheet links to CSS files when rendering HTML to a design surface.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of strings that identify the CSS files associated with the theme or style sheet theme.
This property might return `null`.
Gets an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> object that represents the current designer environment.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost"></xref> that represents the current designer environment.
Retrieves a <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> instance for the specified control, which is used to apply a theme and control skin in a designer environment.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.GetSkinBuilder%2A> method is called by the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> base class to apply a theme and any control skin to a control when it is built at design time.
The control to apply a theme and control skin to.
A <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> instance, if one is defined for the specified control type; otherwise, `null`.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> object that contains a set of <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> objects for the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> for which to retrieve any associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> objects.

An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> that contains a list of one or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder"></xref> objects associated with the <xref href="System.Type"></xref> passed to the method.

This list is populated with <xref href="System.Collections.DictionaryEntry"></xref> objects where the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.SkinID"></xref> is a <xref href="System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Key"></xref>, and its associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.SkinBuilder"></xref> is the <xref href="System.Collections.DictionaryEntry.Value"></xref>.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of skin identifiers that are associated with the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.GetSkinsForControl%2A> method is used by designers to populate lists of control skin names.
Designers use the list to bind to user interface (UI) elements or to display design properties for a given control type.
A <xref href="System.Type"></xref> for which to retrieve any associated skin names.
An <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> of skin identifiers, if control skins are defined for the specified <xref href="System.Type"></xref>.
If no control skins are associated with the type, an empty <xref href="System.Collections.ICollection"></xref> is returned.
Gets the name of the theme or style sheet theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> instance represents.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.ThemeName%2A> property is set by the `name` property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider.%23ctor%28System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerHost%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%5B%5D%2CSystem.String%29> constructor.
The name of the theme or style sheet theme that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ThemeProvider"></xref> instance represents.
